cal_rouge module¶

cal_rouge.chunks(l, n)¶

Yield successive n-sized chunks from l.

cal_rouge.process(data)¶

Process input data Args:

data: candidate and reference text
Returns:
results_dict: a dictionary of ROUGE score results
cal_rouge.rouge_results_to_str(results_dict)¶

Convert ROUGE score results to string format

cal_rouge.test_rouge(cand, ref, num_processes)¶

Calculate ROUGE scores of sequences passed as an iterator e.g. a list of str, an open file, StringIO or even sys.stdin
